short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Audi Wallpaper turn new tab to custom HD Audi background. Audi wallpaper theme for cars fans.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extension Features:

1. Refresh your Audi wallpaper with a new design each time you open a tab.
2. Select or randomize your Audi background in the wallpaper picker.
3. Integrated Google search bar.
4. Direct links to your email and social media profiles.
5. Automatically display the current date and time.
6. New Note feature to jot down your tasks.
7. Quick links to frequently visited sites.
8. Bookmark easy access.
9. Shortcut panel for adding and accessing websites quickly.
10. Instant access to Google apps.
11. Explore more themes easily.
12. Simplified social media sharing.
13. Download wallpapers quickly.
14. Fast access to gaming.
15. Activate engaging animations like snow, rain, leaves, or fireworks on your Audi tab.
